label: Reconstruct metabolic model
description: Reconstructs a metabolic model from an annotated genome.

parameters.label: Genome object
parameters.desc: Input annotated genome for model reconstruction

parameters.label: Gapfilling media
parameters.desc: Media formulation in which model should be initially gapfilled

parameters.label: Template model
parameters.desc: Template upon which model should be constructed

parameters.label: Full DB model
parameters.desc: Add all reactions from template to model regardless of annotation

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.
